message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think the product is worth more than $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go down to $125 just yet. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $130. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $127.50?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $127.50. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $132.50. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $129.50?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go all the way to $129.50. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $131.00. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $129?
